name: Galaxies At War - Pre Alpha
description:
Shoot down enemy Zender troops from other planets.

This is a 3D side-scroller sci-fi game, where the player battles enemies that fire back. The player fires glowing laser bolts at armoured enemy troops. Since this project is on hold, you may only access four rooms. We hope to add more rooms in the future.

Visit our website:    https://dillcorp.wixsite.com/home
